title: Count Grouped Elements | Challenge
description: In Python, you can group elements of a list based on a given function. This can be useful when you want to count the number of occurrences of each group. In this challenge, you will be tasked with creating a function that groups the elements of a list based on a given function and returns the count of elements in each group.

meta.title: Count Grouped Elements Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to group and count elements in a Python list using a given function.
